item.title: 科技巨头在人工智能峰会上向印度投入数十亿美元
item.description: 本周，全球人工智能企业的高管们齐聚印度，与各国领导人共同出席了一场重要的人工智能峰会。【原文：Senior executives from global artificial intelligence firms joined world leaders in India this week for a major AI summit.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称，日产因发动机和变速箱问题将在美国召回约64.3万辆SUV
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周四表示，日产汽车因存在可能导致驱动动力丧失的问题，将在美国召回642,698辆Rogue SUV，此次召回涉及两项独立召回行动。【原文：Nissan is recalling 642,698 Rogue SUVs in the U.S. as part of two separate recalls, over issues that could cause loss of drive power, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Thursday.】

item.title: 谷歌与Shopee母公司海大洋将联合开发电商及游戏领域的人工智能工具
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet与东南亚科技集团Sea Ltd周四宣布达成新合作，将为Sea的电商和游戏产品开发人工智能工具。【原文：Alphabet Inc's Google and Southeast Asian technology conglomerate Sea Ltd announced a new tie-up on Thursday that will develop artificial intelligence tools for Sea's e-commerce and gaming products.】

item.title: 保乐力加上半年销售额下滑，第二季度趋势好转
item.description: 法国烈酒制造商保乐力加报告称，第二季度同店销售额下降5%，原因是美国和中国市场消费需求疲软以及库存调整持续拖累业绩。【原文：French spirits maker Pernod Ricard reported a 5% decline in second-quarter like-for-like sales, as weak consumer demand and destocking in the United States and China continued to weigh.】

item.title: 安巴尼的信实集团将斥资1100亿美元投资人工智能
item.description: 印度信实工业集团及其子公司Jio将在未来七年内投资10万亿卢比（约合1100亿美元）用于人工智能领域，该集团亿万富翁董事长穆克什·安巴尼周四宣布。【原文：India's Reliance Industries and its unit Jio will invest 10 trillion rupees ($110 billion) over the next seven years in artificial intelligence, billionaire Chairman Mukesh Ambani said on Thursday.】

item.title: 雅高酒店集团2025年利润勉强达到预期
item.description: 法国酒店集团雅高周四公布的年度核心利润略高于市场预期，这得益于其酒店组合的多样化发展及其忠诚度计划的扩展。【原文：French hotel group Accor reported annual core profit just above market expectations on Thursday, supported by the diversification of its hotel portfolio and the expansion of its loyalty program.】

item.title: 《金融时报》称摩根大通正就为特朗普和平委员会提供银行服务进行谈判
item.description: 据《金融时报》周四报道，摩根大通正就为美国主导的加沙重建机构"和平委员会"提供银行服务进行磋商，消息人士透露了相关讨论情况。【原文：JPMorgan is in talks to provide banking services to the U.S.-led Board of Peace, an institution tasked with rebuilding Gaza, the Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 电报公司驳斥俄罗斯关于外国情报机构破解其加密系统的指控
item.description: Telegram即时通讯应用表示，其加密系统未发现任何漏洞，驳斥了俄罗斯政府关于外国情报机构能够查看俄军士兵发送消息的指控。【原文：The Telegram messaging app said that it had not found any breaches of its encryption, dismissing a Russian government allegation that foreign intelligence services are able to see messages sent by Russian soldiers.】

item.title: 雀巢第四季度销售额超预期，首席执行官聚焦战略之际计划出售冰淇淋业务
item.description: 雀巢周四公布的第四季度销售额增长超出预期，并表示正将业务重心聚焦于四大核心领域，由其最强品牌引领。该战略调整包括计划出售旗下剩余的冰淇淋业务。【原文：Nestle reported better than expected fourth-quarter sales growth on Thursday and said it was sharpening its focus to four businesses led by its strongest brands, a drive that includes plans to sell off its remaining ice cream business.】

item.title: 解读：拜耳拟以72.5亿美元收购Roundup案能否终结法律纠纷？
item.description: 拜耳旗下孟山都公司提出一项72.5亿美元的全国性集体诉讼和解方案，旨在解决当前及未来所有指控其除草剂"农达"致癌的诉讼，宣称此举是结束多年诉讼的期待已久的途径。本文将探讨该方案能否为拜耳带来所需的法律确定性。【原文：Bayer’s Monsanto unit has proposed a $7.25 billion nationwide class settlement to resolve both current and future lawsuits alleging that its Roundup weedkiller caused cancer, billing it as a long-awaited path toward ending years of litigation. Here's a look at whether it could deliver the legal certainty Bayer needs.】

item.title: 早盘行情：亚洲市场休市，美伊努力避免冲突
item.description: 瑞薇带您展望欧洲及全球市场今日走势【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 洞察：特朗普之后，中国如何谋划主导全球贸易的长期布局
item.description: 中国正寻求将特朗普总统的关税政策转化为自身优势，通过重塑全球贸易格局，使其19万亿美元的经济体在未来很长一段时间内免受美国施压。【原文：China sees an opening to turn President Donald Trump's tariffs to its advantage by reshaping global trade in ways that would insulate its $19 trillion economy from U.S. pressure far into the future.】

item.title: 空客因普惠发动机延误下调产量目标
item.description: 空客周四下调了其主要喷气式飞机的生产目标，称其主要供应商之一RTX旗下普惠公司存在"严重短缺"的发动机问题。该公司同时报告称，其第四季度核心利润增长了17%。【原文：Airbus softened its main jet production target on Thursday, citing "significant shortages" of engines from one of its main suppliers, RTX unit Pratt & Whitney, as it reported a 17% rise in core fourth-quarter profits.】

item.title: 微软表示，该公司认为美国移民与海关执法局并未利用其技术对平民进行大规模监控。
item.description: 微软周三表示，该公司认为美国移民与海关执法局并未利用其技术对平民进行大规模监控，但补充称已向该机构提供基于云的生产力及协作工具。【原文：Microsoft said on Wednesday it did not think the U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement agency was using its technology for mass surveillance of civilians but added that it provided cloud-based productivity and collaboration tools to ICE.】

item.title: 比尔·盖茨缺席印度人工智能峰会，活动因组织混乱蒙上阴影
item.description: 比尔·盖茨在原定周四发表主题演讲前数小时突然退出印度人工智能影响峰会，这场旗舰活动此前已因组织疏漏、机器人故障及代表们对交通中断的抱怨而蒙上阴影，此次事件又对其造成新一轮打击。【原文：Bill Gates pulled out of India's AI Impact Summit hours before his scheduled keynote address on Thursday, dealing another blow to a flagship event already marred by organisational lapses, a robot bungle and delegate complaints over traffic disruptions.】

item.title: 塔塔数据中心业务签约OpenAI为客户
item.description: OpenAI将成为印度塔塔咨询服务公司数据中心业务的首个客户，初期将启用100兆瓦的容量。这家ChatGPT母公司周四宣布了这一消息。【原文：OpenAI will become the first customer of India's Tata Consultancy Services' data center business, beginning with 100 megawatts of capacity, the parent firm of ChatGPT said on Thursday.】

item.title: 阿波罗表示，首席执行官罗温与爱泼斯坦既无商业往来，也无私人关系。
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司周三表示，其首席执行官马克·罗温与已故性犯罪者杰弗里·爱泼斯坦既无业务往来也无私人关系。随着这位已故性犯罪者的通信内容持续曝光，美国企业界正陷入持续动荡。【原文：Apollo Global Management said on Wednesday that CEO Marc Rowan had neither a business nor personal relationship with Jeffrey Epstein, as the unfolding of the late sex offender's correspondence continues to fuel tumult across corporate America.】

item.title: 越南航空公司签署300亿美元协议，订购90架波音客机
item.description: 三家越南航空公司周四与美国制造商波音公司签署协议，共计购买90架飞机。与此同时，越南与美国正就新的贸易协定持续进行谈判。【原文：Three Vietnamese airlines signed deals with U.S. manufacturer Boeing on Thursday to buy a total of 90 aircraft, as Vietnam and the United States continue negotiations on a new trade deal.】

item.title: 亚洲股市受科技股提振，伊朗局势与利率不确定性笼罩市场
item.description: 亚洲股市周四上涨，受到华尔街科技巨头股价上涨的支撑，而持续的美伊紧张局势则支撑着油价，并使黄金因避险资金流入而获得支撑。【原文：Asian stocks rose on Thursday, supported by gains in technology giants on Wall Street, while lingering U.S.-Iran tensions kept oil prices supported and left gold underpinned by safe-haven flows.】

item.title: 油价下跌，因投资者评估美伊紧张局势的发展轨迹
item.description: 周四亚洲早盘时段，油价小幅回落。此前油价已连续两日上涨，累计涨幅达4%。投资者正密切关注美国与伊朗化解紧张局势的努力，而与此同时，双方在关键产油区的军事活动均有所升级。【原文：Oil prices eased in early Asia trade on Thursday, following the previous day's 4% jump, as investors assessed efforts by the U.S. and Iran to resolve tensions while both sides have stepped up military activity in the key oil-producing region.】

item.title: 澳大利亚Zip公司上半年盈利未达预期，股价暴跌近40%
item.description: Zip Co周四公布的上半年营业利润低于预期，导致这家澳大利亚"先买后付"服务提供商的股价暴跌近40%，创下九年来最糟糕的盘中表现。【原文：Zip Co missed estimates for first-half operating earnings on Thursday, causing shares of the Australian buy-now, pay-later services provider to plunge nearly 40% in their weakest intraday session in more than nine years.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，随着欧洲战斗机项目陷入困境，德国正寻求采购更多F-35战机
item.description: 两名消息人士向路透社透露，德国正考虑增购美国制造的F-35战斗机。随着德国与法国联合推进的下一代战斗机项目陷入困境，此举将加深柏林对美国军事技术的依赖。【原文：Germany is considering ordering more U.S.-made F-35 fighter jets, two sources told Reuters, a move that would deepen Berlin's reliance on American military technology as its joint next-generation fighter program with France falters.】

item.title: 越南太阳富国航空公司签署价值225亿美元的协议，订购40架梦想客机
item.description: 越南太阳富国航空公司周四宣布，已与波音公司签署价值225亿美元的协议，将购买40架787-9梦想客机。【原文：Vietnam's Sun PhuQuoc Airways has signed a $22.5 billion deal with Boeing to buy 40 787-9 Dreamliner jets, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 越南航空达成9.65亿美元融资协议，购入6架波音737-8飞机
item.description: 越南廉价航空公司越捷航空周四宣布，已与格里芬全球资产管理公司签署价值9.65亿美元的融资协议，用于购买6架波音737-8型飞机。【原文：Vietnamese budget airline Vietjet has signed a $965 million financing deal with Griffin Global Asset Management for the purchase of 6 Boeing 737-8 aircraft, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 印尼与美国企业签署逾70亿美元贸易投资协议
item.description: 美国-东盟商业理事会表示，印尼与美国企业周三签署了价值逾70亿美元的贸易和投资协议，此举正值印尼总统普拉博沃·苏比安托与美国总统唐纳德·特朗普会晤前夕，双方将于次日签署最终贸易协议。【原文：Indonesian and U.S. companies on Wednesday signed trade and investment deals valued at more than $7 billion a day ahead of Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto's meeting with U.S. President Donald Trump to sign a final trade deal, the U.S.-ASEAN Business Council said.】

item.title: 美元走强，因美联储似乎无意急于降息
item.description: 周四美元汇率脱离近期低点，在反弹后维持涨势。美联储会议纪要显示，政策制定者似乎并不急于降息，且若通胀持续顽固，部分成员持加息立场。【原文：The dollar was off recent lows on Thursday and hanging on to a bounce after minutes from the Federal Reserve showed policymakers did not seem to be in a rush to cut interest rates and that several were open to hikes if inflation proved sticky.】

item.title: 美国司法部调查华纳兄弟拟议出售对影院的影响，彭博新闻报道
item.description: 据彭博社周三报道，美国司法部已召集国内多家大型影院连锁企业进行非公开会谈，讨论华纳兄弟探索公司出售案可能产生的影响。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department has summoned some of the country's major theater chains to private conversations about the potential impact of a sale of Warner Bros Discovery, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据《信息报》报道，Meta重启智能手表计划，目标2026年推出
item.description: 据《信息报》周三报道，Instagram母公司Meta Platforms计划今年推出首款智能手表，消息源自两位知情人士。【原文：Instagram-owner Meta Platforms plans to release its first smartwatch this year, the Information reported on Wednesday, citing two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国机构起诉可口可乐装瓶商，因员工活动排除男性参与
item.description: 美国民权机构起诉可口可乐产品装瓶商和分销商，指控其在员工联谊活动中排斥男性构成性别歧视。这是自特朗普总统上任以来，该机构首次就职场多元化计划提起诉讼。【原文：A U.S. civil rights agency has sued a bottler and distributor of Coca-Cola products it accuses of sex discrimination over an employee networking event that excluded men, its first lawsuit over workplace diversity programs since President Donald Trump took office.】

item.title: Atlassian任命领英资深高管James Chuong为首席财务官
item.description: Atlassian周三宣布任命James Chuong为新任首席财务官，自3月30日起生效，接替Joe Binz的职位。【原文：Atlassian on Wednesday named James Chuong as its new chief financial officer, effective March 30, taking over from Joe Binz.】
